attributes.action: Show dignity and respect to returning war dead.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We request that regulations are put in place to provide police escorts to the hearses of the returning war dead on their journey from the receiving airport to the coroners office in Oxford and beyond to their final resting place. 
These people have given their lives in the service of their country and the least this government can do is to ensure that they are treated with rspect and dignity when they arrive back in this country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
